swp_compiler_ss13.fuc.parser.parser

Class LexerWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • swp_compiler_ss13.fuc.parser.parser.LexerWrapper

  • public class LexerWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to wrap the stream of Tokens from the Lexer with our TokenEx class, so the LRParser receives TokenEx instead.
    Author:
    Gero
